name: Think Hockey
description:
This is a turn-based ice hockey game created for ludum dare 41. Created with the Godot engine. Featuring splitscreen multiplayer or vs ai single player.

Every team can move up to 2 players every turn. Players must have atleast one move point to be able to move or shoot. If a player moves into an opposing player a tackle is performed, stunning the hit player if the tackling player have enough move points (1), otherwise the tackle backfires. 

A game is atleast 60 turns long and the team with the most score will win.

Be nice to the AI player! It didn't get all the love that it required.

Controls:

Left mouse button:
    -Select players
    -Shoot if selected player has the puck

Right mouse button:
    -Move selected player
    -The goalie can move up or down by clicking over/under him
